item.title: 罗氏将投资 7 亿美元在北卡罗来纳州新建药品生产设施
item.description: 罗氏集团周一表示，计划投资 7 亿多美元在北卡罗来纳州霍利斯普林斯市新建一座药品生产厂。【原文：Roche Group said on Monday that it plans to invest more than $700 million in a new drug manufacturing facility in Holly Springs, North Carolina.】

item.title: 人工智能工具撼动教育科技行业，Chegg 将裁员 22
item.description: Chegg 周一表示，随着学生越来越多地转向 ChatGPT 等人工智能驱动的工具，而不是传统的教育技术平台，该公司将裁员约 22%，即 248 人，以削减成本并精简运营。【原文：Chegg said on Monday it would lay off about 22% of its workforce, or 248 employees, to cut costs and streamline its operations as students increasingly turn to AI-powered tools such as ChatGPT over traditional edtech platforms.】

item.title: 埃里克-特朗普支持的美国比特币公司将通过全股合并上市
item.description: 由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的两个长子支持的新比特币矿商美国比特币公司（American Bitcoin）周一表示，将通过与麒麟数字矿业公司（Gryphon Digital Mining）的全股票合并在纳斯达克上市。【原文：American Bitcoin, a new bitcoin miner backed by U.S. President Donald Trump's two eldest sons, said on Monday it will list on the Nasdaq via an all-stock merger with Gryphon Digital Mining .】

item.title: 中国官方媒体欢迎美国关税协议，其他媒体则持怀疑态度
item.description: 中美两国周一达成的关税协议在中国社交媒体上受到怀疑，而官方评论则对这一消息表示欢迎。【原文：A tariff deal between the United States and China on Monday was greeted with scepticism on Chinese social media, while official commentary welcomed the news.】

item.title: 保险经纪公司 Hub International 获 16 亿美元投资，估值达 290 亿美元
item.description: 保险经纪公司 Hub International 周一表示，该公司在一项约 16 亿美元的少数股权投资交易中获得了 290 亿美元的估值。【原文：Insurance broker Hub International said on Monday it has secured a $29 billion valuation in a minority investment transaction of about $1.6 billion.】

item.title: 投资者欢呼中美关税休战，但对最终协议持谨慎态度
item.description: 中美贸易谈判取得突破性进展，推动全球股市和美元走高，但投资者担心进一步的谈判可能会是一个漫长的过程，从而抑制了乐观情绪，因为全球经济放缓的风险依然存在。【原文：A breakthrough in U.S.-China trade talks has propelled world stocks and the dollar higher, but investors fear further negotiations could prove a long slog, tempering optimism, as risks of a global economic slowdown persist.】

item.title: 消息人士称，贸易休战后美国客户应更容易获得中国稀土许可证
item.description: 据中国业内的两位消息人士称，周一贸易战休战后，美国客户的稀土出口许可证可能更容易获得中国政府的批准，但不可能完全取消限制。【原文：Rare earth export permits for U.S. customers are likely to have an easier time getting approval from Beijing after Monday's trade war truce, however a complete removal of the restrictions is unlikely, according to two sources in the industry in China.】

item.title: 福克斯公司季度收入超出预期，超级碗带动广告业务增长
item.description: 福克斯公司周一公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于超级碗带动的广告业务增长、Tubi 流媒体服务的强劲表现以及更高的新闻收视率和定价。【原文：Fox Corp beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Monday, thanks to advertising growth driven by the Super Bowl, strength in its Tubi streaming service and stronger news ratings and pricing.】

item.title: 百威啤酒制造商百威英博将向美国设施投资 3 亿美元
item.description: 安海斯-布希英博公司（Anheuser-Busch InBev）周一表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统推动本地生产的背景下，该公司今年将向其在美国的制造业务投资 3 亿美元。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev said on Monday it would invest $300 million in its manufacturing operations in the United States this year amid a push for local production under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: Stellantis 预计 11 月开始生产混合动力菲亚特 500
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 周一表示，其目标是在 11 月开始生产混合动力版菲亚特 500 城市汽车。【原文：Automaker Stellantis aims to start producing the hybrid version of its Fiat 500 city car in November, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 垂直宇航公司计划推出远程混合空中出租车变体，以扩大市场覆盖范围
item.description: 垂直宇航公司（Vertical Aerospace）周一表示，该公司正在开发其空中出租车 VX4 的远程混合动力电动变体，旨在拓展包括国防和物流在内的商业市场。【原文：Vertical Aerospace said on Monday it is developing a long-range hybrid-electric variant of its air-taxi VX4, aiming to expand into commercial markets including defense and logistics.】

item.title: GTA VI》延期后，电子游戏发行商急于抢占秋季上市窗口
item.description: 在 Take-Two Interactive 公司将《侠盗猎车手 6》的上市时间推迟到明年 5 月的几天后，竞争对手的发行商们正在利用这个机会锁定其游戏的上市日期，以避免与业界最令人期待的游戏之一直接冲突。【原文：Days after Take-Two Interactive delayed the launch of "Grand Theft Auto VI" to May next year, rival publishers are using that opportunity to lock in release dates for their games to avoid a direct clash with one of the industry's most anticipated titles.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯在 PIF 框架下成立人工智能开发公司
item.description: 据沙特阿拉伯国家通讯社周一报道，沙特阿拉伯王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）在公共投资基金（PIF）下成立了一家新公司，负责开发和管理人工智能技术。【原文：Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman launched a new company under the Public Investment Fund (PIF) to develop and manage artificial intelligence technologies, the state news agency reported on Monday.】

item.title: 电商包裹被排除在中美关税缓和措施之外
item.description: 美国和中国周一宣布了一项暂时削减关税的协议，但该协议并未涉及从中国到美国的低价值电子商务包裹将如何处理的问题，因为这些包裹仍需缴纳关税。【原文：An agreement between the United States and China to temporarily slash tariffs, announced on Monday, did not address what would happen to low-value ecommerce packages from China to the U.S. which are still subject to tariffs.】

item.title: 条款书显示，中国蚂蚁金服集团将以 2.42 亿美元的价格出售印度 Paytm 公司 4% 的股份
item.description: 路透社周一看到的一份条款书显示，中国蚂蚁金服集团将以 2.42 亿美元的价格出售印度支付公司 Paytm 4% 的股份。【原文：China's Ant Group will sell a 4% stake in Indian payments firm Paytm for $242 million, a term sheet seen by Reuters showed on Monday.】

item.title: 以色列量子计算公司 Classiq 获得 1.1 亿美元私人融资
item.description: 以色列量子计算初创公司 Classiq 周一表示，已在一轮中期私人融资中筹集到 1.1 亿美元，使其筹资总额达到 1.73 亿美元。【原文：Israeli quantum computing startup Classiq has raised $110 million in a mid-stage private funding round, it said on Monday, bringing its total fundraising to $173 million.】

item.title: 推动成本节约，需求改善，Polestar 季度亏损收窄
item.description: 瑞典电动汽车制造商 Polestar 周一报告称，其季度亏损减少了 31%，这表明该公司削减业务成本和推动高价车型销售的努力正在取得成效。【原文：Swedish electric-vehicle maker Polestar reported a 31% reduction in its quarterly loss on Monday, in a sign that the company's efforts to cut costs across its business and push sales of its higher-priced models were bearing fruit.】

item.title: 福特德国工人将在科隆工厂举行罢工
item.description: 汽车制造商福特公司位于德国科隆的两家工厂的工人们将于周三举行罢工，他们的工会负责人周一表示。【原文：Workers at the auto maker Ford's two plants in Cologne, Germany, will go on strike on Wednesday, their works council head said on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞标：我们时代的贸易和平？
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 特朗普称将把药价降低 59
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他将把处方药价格削减 59%，但在周一晚些时候于白宫举行的一次与健康有关的活动之前，他没有就其降低医药成本的计划提供更多细节。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he would cut prescription drug prices by 59%, but gave no further details about his plan to lower medicine costs ahead of a health-related event at the White House later on Monday.】

item.title: 中国 3 月份外国品牌手机出货量下降近 50
item.description: 一家政府下属研究公司周一公布的数据显示，包括苹果公司iPhone手机在内的外国品牌手机3月份在中国的出货量同比下降了49.6%。【原文：Chinese shipments of foreign-branded cellphones, including Apple Inc's iPhones, dropped by 49.6% year on year in March, according to data released on Monday by a government-affiliated research company.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：苹果考虑提高 iPhone 价格
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司正在考虑提高其秋季 iPhone 系列产品的价格，以配合新功能和设计变化。【原文：Apple is considering raising the prices of its fall iPhone lineup, a step it is seeking to couple with new features and design changes, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卢拉会见习近平，巴西寻求在特朗普关税乱局中促进对华贸易
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）本周将前往北京与习近平会面，寻求加强两国关系，同时利用美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）难以预测的贸易政策来促进谷物、金属和肉类对华出口。【原文：Brazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva heads to Beijing this week to meet his counterpart Xi Jinping, seeking to tighten relations between the two nations while leveraging U.S. President Donald Trump's unpredictable trade policies to boost exports of grains, metals and meat to China.】

item.title: 关税不确定性给美国电视年度广告销售盛宴的前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 关税引发美国经济衰退的风险笼罩着电视业一年一度的前期销售旺季，在这个季节里，各家公司都会推出星光熠熠的广告，以吸引品牌承诺在未来一年中投入数十亿美元的广告费用。【原文：The risk of a tariff-induced U.S. recession is hanging over the television industry's annual upfront selling season, when companies stage star-studded pitches to coax brands to commit to spending billions of dollars on advertising in the year ahead.】

item.title: 购买 $TRUMP 纪念币的人支付数百万美元赢得与特朗普总统共进晚餐的机会
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的 $TRUMP 纪念币的购买者有望在周一获知他们是否赢得了 5 月 22 日在华盛顿特区外的乡村俱乐部与总统共进晚餐的机会。【原文：Buyers of U.S. President Donald Trump’s $TRUMP meme coin are expected to learn Monday if they’ve won an opportunity to dine with the president at his country club outside of Washington, D.C. on May 22.】

item.title: 航运集团马士基称中美协议方向正确，股价飙升
item.description: 丹麦航运集团马士基周一表示，中国和美国达成的暂停加征关税和对等关税90天的协议是朝着正确方向迈出的一步。【原文：Danish shipping group Maersk said on Monday that the agreement between China and the United States to introduce a 90-day pause on tariffs and reciprocal duties was a step in the right direction.】

item.title: 中国和美国在日内瓦达成了什么协议？
item.description: 中国和美国周一在日内瓦举行会谈后宣布贸易战休战，将在周三之前削减大部分关税和其他反制措施。【原文：China and the United States announced a truce in their trade war on Monday after talks in Geneva that will roll back the bulk of tariffs and other countermeasures by Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国维珍媒体 O2 和雏菊集团联合开展商业电信业务
item.description: 英国维珍媒体 O2 表示，它将把企业部门与企业对企业电信供应商 Daisy Group 合并，为企业提供新的通信和 IT 服务。【原文：Britain's Virgin Media O2 said it was combining its enterprise unit with business-to-business telecoms provider Daisy Group to create a new communications and IT offer for companies.】

item.title: 据 NHK 报道，日产汽车将在全球再裁员 10,000 多人
item.description: 据日本公共广播公司 NHK 周一报道，日产汽车公司还将在全球范围内裁减 10,000 多个工作岗位，包括之前宣布的裁员在内，裁员总数将达到约 20,000 人，占其员工总数的 15%。【原文：Nissan Motor will additionally slash more than 10,000 jobs globally, bringing the total cuts including previously announced layoffs to about 20,000 or 15% of its workforce, Japan's public broadcaster NHK reported on Monday.】

item.title: 中美贸易僵局解冻，美国股指期货大涨
item.description: 在美国和中国表示已达成降低关税的协议后，美国股指期货周一跳涨，缓解了曾笼罩全球市场的对全面贸易战的担忧。【原文：U.S. stock index futures jumped on Monday after the United States and China said they had reached a deal to reduce tariffs, easing concerns of an all-out trade war that had gripped global markets.】
